properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 7:47PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Fox River...Kankakee River...

Fox River at Montgomery affecting Kane and Kendall Counties
Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake and Newton Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Kankakee River at Shelby, or from Near I-65 and De Motte
downstream to IL/IN state line.
* until further notice.
* At  645 PM Friday the stage was 9.4 feet.
* Action stage is 9.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.5 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 10.1 feet by Sunday
afternoon.
* Impact...At 10.5 feet...Water overflows low-lying river banks along
Bluegrass Road and in Wildwood Estates east of Sumava Resorts.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
